title: ICE on maybe build.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ``` error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug. note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md note: rustc 1.52.0 (88f19c6da 2021-05-03) running on x86_64-apple-darwin note: compiler flags: -C embed-bitcode=no -C split-debuginfo=unpacked -C debuginfo=2 -C incremental --crate-type bin note: some of the compiler flags provided by cargo are hidden ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.52.0 (88f19c6da 2021-05-03) binary: rustc commit-hash: 88f19c6dab716c6281af7602e30f413e809c5974 commit-date: 2021-05-03 host: x86_64-apple-darwin release: 1.52.0 LLVM version: 12.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` Compiling remote-apis v0.1.0 (/Users/tschuett/Work/rust-stuff/remote-apis) thread 'rustc' panicked at 'found unstable fingerprints for predicates_of(core[7cda]::fmt::Debug): GenericPredicates { parent: None, predicates: [(Binder(TraitPredicate()), /Users/schuett/.rustup/toolchains/1.52.0-x86_64-apple-darwin/lib/rustlib/src/rust/library/core/src/fmt/mod.rs:550:1: 550:16 (#0))] }', /rustc/88f19c6dab716c6281af7602e30f413e809c5974/compiler/rustc_query_system/src/query/plumbing.rs:593:5 ```
Backtrace
